00152 int nfs_Getattr( nfs_arg_t         * parg,    
00153                  exportlist_t      * pexport, 
00154                  fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext,   
00155                  cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00156                  hash_table_t      * ht,
00157                  struct svc_req    * preq,    
00158                  nfs_res_t         * pres ) 
00159 {
00160         static char  __attribute__(( __unused__ ))   funcName[] = "nfs_Getattr";
00161 
00162   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr;
00163         cache_entry_t         * pentry = NULL ;
00164   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status ;
00165   int                     rc = 0 ;
00166 
00167   if( ( pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00168                                      &(parg->arg_getattr2),
00169                                      &(parg->arg_getattr3.object),
00170                                      NULL, 
00171                                      &(pres->res_attr2.status),
00172                                      &(pres->res_getattr3.status),
00173                                      NULL,
00174                                      &attr, 
00175                                      pcontext, 
00176                                      pclient, 
00177                                      ht, 
00178                                      &rc ) ) == NULL )
00179     {
00180       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00181       return rc ;
00182    }
00183 
00184    if( ( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 ) && 
00185        ( nfs3_Is_Fh_Xattr( &(parg->arg_getattr3.object) ) ) )
00186      return nfs3_Getattr_Xattr( parg, 
00187                                 pexport, 
00188                                 pcontext,
00189                                 pclient,
00190                                 ht,
00191                                 preq, 
00192                                 pres ) ;
00193 
00194    /*
00195     * Get attributes.  Use NULL for the file name since we have the
00196     * vnode to define the file. 
00197     */
00198    if( cache_inode_getattr( pentry,
00199                             &attr, 
00200                             ht, 
00201                             pclient, 
00202                             pcontext, 
00203                             &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00204     {
00205       /*
00206        * Client API should be keeping us from crossing junctions,
00207        * but double check to be sure. 
00208        */
00209       
00210       switch( preq->rq_vers )
00211         {
00212           
00213         case NFS_V2:
00214           /* Copy data from vattr to Attributes */
00215           if( nfs2_FSALattr_To_Fattr( pexport, &attr,
00216                                       &(pres->res_attr2.ATTR2res_u.attributes ) ) == 0 )
00217             {
00218               nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00219                                    preq->rq_vers, 
00220                                    CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT,
00221                                    &pres->res_attr2.status,
00222                                    &pres->res_getattr3.status,
00223                                    NULL, NULL,
00224                                    NULL, NULL, NULL,
00225                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00226               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00227             }
00228           pres->res_attr2.status = NFS_OK;
00229           break;
00230                         
00231         case NFS_V3:
00232           if( nfs3_FSALattr_To_Fattr( pexport, &attr, 
00233                                       &(pres->res_getattr3.GETATTR3res_u.resok.obj_attributes) ) == 0 )
00234             {
00235               nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00236                                    preq->rq_vers,
00237                                    CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT,
00238                                    &pres->res_attr2.status,
00239                                    &pres->res_getattr3.status,
00240                                    NULL, NULL,
00241                                    NULL, NULL, NULL,
00242                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00243               
00244               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00245             }
00246           pres->res_getattr3.status = NFS3_OK;
00247           break;
00248         } /* switch */
00249         
00250       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00251                 }
00252   
00253   
00254   nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00255                        preq->rq_vers, 
00256                        CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT,
00257                        &pres->res_attr2.status,
00258                        &pres->res_getattr3.status,
00259                        NULL, NULL,
00260                        NULL, NULL, NULL,
00261                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00262   
00263         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00264 } /* nfs_Getattr */
00265 
00274 void nfs_Getattr_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00275 {
00276   /* Nothing to do here */
00277   return ;
00278 } /* nfs_Getattr_Free */
